reviews.review_msg: He is the best Prof I ever had in Math. he made you feel smart because how he explained stuff made math seem super easy and fun. Get ready to feel like a genius.
He tried to shoot me with his laser pointer in class. Plus, I saw him eating teriyaki in the cafe, somehow I think that is pretty funny. *smile*

Very caring upbeat prof. Makes sure every student understands and goes into great detail to answer questions. Only problem is his teaching style is a bit disorganized and i didn't know why were learning certain things. The homework was much harder than the exams. Exam were very easy and fair. Similar to the samples he gives

Such a jolly person. My only criticism is that he stutters like crazy in lecture and can often take a while to get to the point, thus why I'm giving 4. The assignments helped teach us almost everything on the exams. Final project was very free in regards to what we wanted to do it on. Super accessible for questions after class. Stress-free course.

The recent 1 star reviews from Dr. J instructing people online do not do justice to his passion for teaching mathematics, nor his sheer generosity as a professor. Dr. J gives amazing feedback, and his in-person instructing is magnetic. People who had him online truly missed out on an amazing professor who wants nothing more than for you to succeed.
